preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 450 g of beryllium powder using a precision balance. 
 2. Weigh 50 g of scandium powder. 
 3. Measure 900 g of tungsten powder. 
 4. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all three powders thoroughly using a mechanical mixer or mortar and pestle to ensure an even distribution.
